Actions.Name: Annihilate
Actions.Effects: Attack target becomes vulnerable and burning. Attacks against a burning foe increase the area size to blast 2.
Actions.TerrainEffect: After attack resolves, summon a height 1 boulder object in the area.

Actions.Name: Great Slip
Actions.Description: Remove self from the battlefield, then return in a free space in range 3.

Actions.Name: Fell Shot
Actions.Description: Mark an unoccupied space in range 8.
Actions.AreaEffect: Characters that enter that space or start their turn there are struck by a projectile, taking 2 piercing damage twice, and ending this effect.

Actions.Name: Liminal Arrows
Actions.Description: Choose a foe in line of sight and range 10. At the end of that character's turn, they take [D] piercing damage 3 times if not in cover from the crucible, or just [fray] piercing damage if it's in cover. Then this effect ends.
